short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AstraX is a non-custodial wallet extension that enables you to sign DigitalBits transactions via your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The AstraX wallet does not store your personal information, giving you total control of how you transact on the DigitalBits network.
